name: Archons: Arena
description:
Step into the arena for a chance to become the champion.

Features

  • Build your deck the way you want to, right from the start, without the grind or randomness.
  • Add cards to your deck by unlocking skills and abilities of your character.
  • Spend gold on new gear but remember that equipment degrades.
  • Face challenging opponents that force you to change your strategy.
  • Small health pool requires you to pay close attention to each fight.
  • Customizable difficulty to keep the game challenging and fun
